QuestData.Title: Stillpine Hold
QuestData.Description: Promised one, you must travel north to the home of my people - Stillpine Hold. It is there that you will face your most daunting challenge.$B$BGo now, High Chief Stillpine awaits your arrival.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with High Chief Stillpine at Stillpine Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: For centuries, we lived in relative peace with the creatures of the land. Several months ago, Kurz began to see dark omens. The peace that we enjoyed for so long was to be lost. The extent of the catastrophe could not be known!$B$BSo it would be that the gods would shatter our land - turning both friend and foe against us. But there was something else... Amidst the chaos, a hero would rise: A hero not of Stillpine blood. The Promised One would deliver us from devastation.$B$BThat prophesied hero was you.
